name: Escapie
description:
This is a short prototype third person action /adventure/platformer(combination of those) of a game i worked on. My first time with unity and C#. Learned a lot from this(blender,animations,scripting,etc). Will definitely improve the skills i have learned and them implement them onto my next project.

Feel free to leave me any feedback let me know if you run into any game breaking issues but note i will not be working on this prototype further and will now move onto the next one using the skills I have learned.

The next project will be similar but much more improved.

Thank you for your time.
